Text: Oñ abu ku So̩l leku, e̩gba ki Defid doji kwoko ekpa abo Amale̩k, ki Defid la jʼo̩jo̩ meji Ziklag;
oñ i lewatu o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩ta-wñ, go, one̩ kwʼuru abogu So̩l le̩ wa, ukpo-wñ chʼe̩fana nyʼo̩ o̩la, ebutu la dʼoji-wñ: oñ e̩gba kʼi lewʼugbo Defid, i fʼeju bʼane̩ ma oñ i dojikane̩ ñw u.
Taku Defid ka ñw u kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo wa? Oñ i ka ñw u kakini, U fʼuma o̩wo̩ kwʼuru abogu Israe̩l wa.
Taki Defid ka ñw u kakini, Ab o̩la le̩ le ta? Agba, e̩ ka ñwu mi ke. Tak i dohi kakini, Amone̩ ra bʼogu le̩ te̩ me̩, amone̩ wewe laño̩ lewane̩, ma leku. So̩l kpai Jo̩natan o̩ma-wñ ño̩ leku ge̩.
Taku Defid tʼokolobia kʼi ka ñw u le̩ ene kakini, Ab i le kʼe̩ ma ka ku So̩l kpʼo̩ma-wñ Jo̩natan leku?
Tak okolobia ki ko̩la ñw u ka ñw u kakini, Abu kʼu le gagaga akpachu oj uwo Gilboa, go, So̩l lo̩nʼo̩kwo̩-wñ o̩mo̩; e̩ la go, abo ku ma jʼef o̩ko̩ ogu kpʼamananya tʼo̩ ubi anane̩.
Tak e̩gba kʼi gʼubi-wñ, i fʼumi li, oñ i fʼumi do̩. Tak u dohi kakini, Omi de̩.
Oñ i ka ñwu mi kakini, Uwe̩ e̩ne̩ de̩? Tak u dohi ñw u kakini, E̩ne̩ Amale̩k u che.
Tak i ka ñwu mi kakini, Agba, e̩ dago kpenyʼumi kʼe̩ fʼumi kpa; todu ochuchu fʼumi mu, iñmi-mi dʼef umi ogbolo ta.
Abe̩le̩ u kwo dago kpenyʼu, oñ u mʼu du kpa, todabu kʼu chema ka kʼi ñʼaye abu kʼi wane̩ o̩mo̩ le̩ ge̩ n; tak u mʼike̩be̩ ki dʼoji-wñ du, kpai ude̩ ki damʼo̩wo̩-wñ, oñ u mʼu ko wa ñw odu-mi emi-i.
Defid muda gwo̩nyʼe̩wñ o̩la-wñ oñ i fʼu fana; abe̩le̩ aboke̩le̩ du ku ma jʼugbo-wñ ño̩ che;
taku ma kwodaido̩, oñ ma raku oñ ma nʼalu aji gbogbo nyʼane̩, todu Sol kpai o̩ma-wñ Jo̩natan, kpai todu amone̩ Jihofa, kpʼabunyi abo Israe̩l; todabu kʼalu o̩kwo̩chageli gwo ma da jʼane̩.
Taku Defid tʼokolobia ki ka ñw u le̩ ene kakini, Ugbo e̩ kwo? Oñ i dohi kakini, O̩ma ilowa, e̩ne̩ Amale̩k, u che.
Taku Defid ka ñw u kakini, Ab i le kʼe̩ ma railo enʼo̩wo̩ dala akpa e̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji-i n?
Taku Defid fʼokolobiaʼka do̩ wa, oñ i kakini, Te̩ nyʼugbo-wñ kʼe̩ bʼo ma. Tak i mʼu du kpa.
Defid la ka ñw u kakini, E̩bie̩-we̩ ki bʼonugo-we̩ oji ma; todu alu-we̩ fʼibenu gba nyʼuwe̩ kakini, U mʼe̩ne̩ ku Jihofa fʼekpo ba tʼo̩ oji du kpa me̩.
Taku Defid nʼinaku kide̩ ada todu So̩l kpai Jo̩natan o̩ma-wñ
oñ i je̩ ñw ma ko̩ abo Juda eli o̩o̩do̩ le̩, go, ma fʼeli-wñ ko̩ nyʼubuku Jashar kakini,
O Israe̩l, ma mʼegbi-we̩ du kpa oj otete otete-we̩ me̩!
Me̩ ki dʼo̩la le̩ ka efu Gat in,
O uwo uwo Gilboa,
O̩o̩do̩ Jo̩natan dubigba e̩bie̩ abo ku ma kpa
Ma fe̩do̩ So̩l kpai Jo̩natan, ma chʼuto̩ ef udeju-ma,
Ame̩ amo̩ma onobule̩ Israe̩l, me̩ naraku So̩l,
Me̩ go abu kʼame̩nugbiti lewane̩
E̩do̩-mi kpabie̩ tod uwe̩ Jo̩natan, o̩maye-mi;
Me̩ go abu kʼame̩nugbiti lewane̩ ke,
